titleInfo.title: American Story In Song - Audition - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: CBS/WBBM audition for radio program the American Story In Song, part 2. Featuring Bob Atcher, the Columbia String Band, 'The Quartet', Sally & Billie, and host Ted Grizzard. Though the disc is labeled as 'Art Satherley show', the program is introduced as the 'American Story In Song'. Circa 1946 based on another audition recording for this program (see TR001367 ).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
